title: To the Moderator who deleted my Topic with no warning or notification
body:
Corrupted like Politicians 

No Respect Your type is the abusive little kid with power

A.N.A.R.C.H.Y

One of these days im sure someone is going to hack this forums and take you corrupted sons of guns down, flush all your bias biggerism away.

Now delete this you punk{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 
<removed for inappropriate content>

replies.body:
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
you dont learn do you? this post will be deleted again, you will be banned and noone will give a fuck about rofl

wait.. why are you following me?  i saw you comment on other post of mine..

weirdo

if you remember names, check out the other names. you will see a lot of them are the same. its called reading the threads on the board. if you post 2 threads on the same board, there is a 90% chance that i will see and usually read your posts.

^ truth. 

but I'll give a frack actually, cuz this kid is funny, however unbalanced  he may seem, we need more humor and less monotonous rito-speak

http://assets.roulettereactions.com/hashed_silo_content/silo_content/27476/resized/1276220377189.jpg
go away pls and ty. trololol

We reviewed your original post and have un-deleted it as it didn't show anyone's name but yours.  I've also removed the video from the OP as it contained comments inappropriate for the Boards.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i did not right this please do not ban me, i left my computer on falling asleep she must have typed on the forums
NOOOO I DID NOT RIGHT THIS!!!!!!!! IM SORRY PLEASE, IT WAS MY GIRLFRIEND DO NOT BAN ME!
And you wonder why your thread was deleted

Good luck with that, unless you are on 'the list' of the chosen few, they won't even give it a second glance.

 Like I think Terrified Nami got a message mistakenly deleted undeleted and an apology, however my own msg got no such attention.

I had posted something jokingly about how apparently some guy knew about the Zika Virus years before it was even in the news, and they deleted it for 'naming and shaming' 

honesty, I wouldn't take it personally, they are probably working from a sweat shop in mumbai.

Incidentally this is also how I finally realzed these mods must have been outsourced/offshored by Riot to the lowest bidder, i don't think they actually play league themselves.
